title: Apple Restricts Use of ChatGPT, Joining Other Companies Wary of Leaks
One Grill to Rule Them All: Is the Weber Kettle the Only Grill You'll Ever Need?
description: Americans who love to cook outside might think they need a gas grill, pellet smoker, and even a pizza oven. But with the right technique and accessories, the does-everything Kettle is a triple threat.

title: A Meta Platforms Leak Put Powerful AI in the Hands of Everyone
description: Meta in February started giving a limited number of researchers access to advanced AI language software it had developed to enable chatbots similar to ChatGPT. But someone posted the code publicly, spurring the emergence of homegrown tools.

title: Chinese Tech Giants' Results Reflect Lackluster Economic Recovery
description: Alibaba’s shares fall after revenue misses forecasts; Tencent and Baidu see more marked upturn.

title: Risks Posed by AI Technology Spur Calls for New Regulatory Agency
description: It could be charged with granting licenses for AI platforms, setting operating standards and enforcing compliance with the rules, according to proponents including Sam Altman, chief executive of ChatGPT creator OpenAI.

title: AT&T Is Spending Billions to Wire U.S. for Fast Internet as Rivals Take Different Path
description: The telecommunications giant is broadening its network of fiber-optic cables amid a slowdown in mobile growth.

title: Micron Outlines $3.6 Billion Investment With Japan's Backing
description: The U.S. chip maker’s deal with Tokyo comes at a time of rising tension between Washington and Beijing over chip technology.
